title: Patch Notes
content: th Gale when he sacrifices himself in the endgame to defeat the Netherbrain will now receive a tonally appropriate (read: lovey-dovey) letter that was missing. Fixed a dialogue issue preventing Avatar Gale from talking about the orb to Lae'zel after consuming a magic item. You should no longer be able to ask Shadowheart about her Shar worship after recruiting her at the Goblin Camp if you don't know about her faith.
